basic.description:
The principles of energy and water exchange between the atmosphere, surface and subsurface. The hydrological cycle, radiation, and energy balances are used as conceptual frameworks.
LEARNING HOURS    114 (36L;18Pc;60P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Principles of Hydroclimatology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY102 or permission of the deptartment.
